programme.title: Playing Lessons
programme.desc: Bryson DeChambeau joins instructor Sean Foley to discuss DeChambeau's unique scientific approach to the game. He shares what factors he considers before each shot, how he makes his club choices, and his method for reading greens.

programme.title: Playing Lessons
programme.desc: Tony Finau joins instructor Sean Foley on the course for an "inside the ropes" look at one of golf's longest hitters. Finau shares his insight on how he manages his way around the course from tee to green.

programme.title: Playing Lessons
programme.desc: The 2-time World Long Drive champion, Tim Burke, joins Sean Foley for a look at one of golf's longest drivers. Burke, a former college baseball player, turned his unique ability to drive the golf ball a long way into a world-class career.

programme.title: Playing Lessons
programme.desc: 2016 European Ryder Cup player Matthew Fitzpatrick shares his best tips, drills and instruction as he navigates the beautiful Loblolly in Hobe Sound, Florida.

programme.title: Playing Lessons
programme.desc: PGA winner Kevin Chappell plays the final stretch of iconic Bay Hill with renowned instructor Sean Foley; how Chappell finds the fairway when he needs to and makes putts under pressure.

programme.title: Playing Lessons
programme.desc: The 2017 RBC Heritage winner Wesley Bryan shares his best instruction tips and drills. Bryan breaks down how he became one of the Tour's best from inside 100 yards and how he executes from varying lies around the golf course.

programme.title: Playing Lessons
programme.desc: Three-time winner on the PGA TOUR Brendan Steele welcomes Sean Foley to Shady Canyon, where Steele highlights all facets of his game. From exceptional distance and accuracy off the tee, to great iron play to a unique approach around the greens.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Learn how to build a practice station for improving start line, an easy guide to green reading and tips for better speed control used by 2023 Masters Champion Jon Rahm.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Learn a Ben Hogan tip for improving a backswing, how an alignment stick can cure a transition faults and a creative drill using maracas to shake up a downswing sequence.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Devan Bonebrake covers the biggest keys and teaches his favorite drills for getting up and down from greenside bunkers.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Devan Bonebrake teaches how to develop a go-to shot that will help to play under pressure like a Major Champion; learn how to hit power fades like Jon Rahm, high draws like Rory McIlroy and low stingers like Tiger Woods.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Learn how a water bottle will help to stop scooping pitch shots, how a slip and slide will help on downhill lies and how a fairway wood will help players scramble like Tiger Woods.
